subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Phil Kessel had a goal and two assists to extend his league-best points streak to 14 games, and the Bruins scored four times on their first five shots in a victory over Atlanta Friday night.
snippet: Phil Kessel had a goal and two assists to extend his league-best points streak to 14 games, and the Bruins scored four times on their first five shots in a victory over Atlanta Friday night.
